00118 //Returns true if the player knows how many enemies are in the sector if that number is greater than 0.

00121 
00122 //There is a special case flag used when players encounter enemies in a sector, then retreat.  The number of enemies
00123 //will display on mapscreen until time is compressed.  When time is compressed, the flag is cleared, and
00124 //a question mark is displayed to reflect that the player no longer knows.  This is the function that clears that
00125 //flag.
00126 void ClearAnySectorsFlashingNumberOfEnemies();
